homearticle1.title: Finding simplicity in life

homearticle1.link: a few of which we've explored in the past

homearticle1.strong: Life can get complicated really quickly

homearticle2.title: Keeping cooking simple
homearticle2.body:
Food is a very important part of everyone's life.
 If you want to be healthy, you have to eat healthy.
 One of the easiest ways to do that is to keep your cooking nice and simple.

homearticle3.title: Simple decoractions
homearticle3.body:
A home isn't a home until you've decorated a little.
 People either don't decorate, or they go overboard and it doesn't have the impact they were hoping for. 
 Staying simple will help draw the eye where you want it to and make things pop like never before.

homearticle4.title: Simplicity and work
homearticle4.body:
Work is often a major source of stress. People get frustrated,it ruins their relationship with others and it leads to burnout. 
 By keeping your work life as simple as possible, it will help balance everything out.
homearticle4.alt: desk chair with a white table

about.title: My name is Jerrell and living the simple life saved my life
about.body: . I would purchase so many things that I thought that I loved, but the truth was I couldn't even appreciate any of it because there was too much. Things were terrible, my priorities I had none! I was spending money that should have been invested in assests, but i was purchasing junk all while still living at home with my parents. Life wasn't good for me then.

abouttopic1.subtitle: How I turned things around
abouttopic1.strong: I was on the verge of a breakdown
abouttopic1.body: . I literally sold 90% of my possessions and moved into a small apartment. It wasn't easy at all, but everything around me was in such a place, I didn't know what else to do. Yet, it worked.

abouttopic2.subtitle: Now I live the simple life
abouttopic2.strong: I felt like I had no choice but to start sharing how I did it,
abouttopic2.body: Now that I'm living a simple life, things are so much better. I'm less stressed, enjoying life and my family more,and I have more free time and gained financial literacy. With how much it turned my life around,
abouttopic2.bodycont: and how others can benefit from living a simple life as well, which is why I started this site!
